title: Dekaflow 2
description: A next-generation energy management platform for Berkshire Hathaway Energy, built to optimize workflows, improve accessibility, and introduce AI-powered productivity tools.
businessImpact: Supported critical energy infrastructure by modernizing front-end systems, improving accessibility, and mentoring engineers to ensure sustainable development practices.
highlights: Reviewed PRs, wrote scalable React + TypeScript code with Material UI & Next.js.
Helped integrate AI tools for coding assistance, documentation, and meeting note-taking.
Collaborated across squads to align front-end delivery with backend, QA, and design requirements.

title: DanceCard
description: A mobile-first social app connecting people through shared hobbies and events — designed to encourage real-world connection rather than doom-scrolling.
businessImpact: Built from the ground up and deployed to iOS and Android, helping people connect locally while showcasing strong full-stack and deployment skills.
highlights: Co-founded and led development of the React Native application.
Implemented real-time chat, event scheduling, and location-aware features.
Shipped companion web app and Supabase backend with secure authentication.

title: Duke’s Country
description: A React-based site for Duke’s Mayonnaise, designed to deliver brand storytelling and event-driven content without selling products directly.
businessImpact: Handled hundreds of thousands of visitors during the Duke’s Mayo Bowl, engaging fans through contests, recipes, and interactive content.
highlights: Built backend tools enabling marketing teams to log in and update photos, contests, and site content dynamically.
Ensured site stability during massive traffic surges on game day.
Delivered a custom, branded experience built for speed and reliability.

title: Hot Tomato Summer
description: A large-scale, multi-city restaurant voting contest that grew from a small campaign into a nationwide phenomenon.
businessImpact: Scaled to handle tens of thousands of voters and hundreds of participating restaurants, while implementing anti-cheating mechanisms.
highlights: Built dashboards for restaurants to upload information and track voting analytics.
Developed internal employee dashboards for approving/denying edits and monitoring traffic.
Implemented fraud prevention with user fingerprinting and authentication.

title: Kernel Season’s Sweepstakes
description: A reusable sweepstakes platform with dynamic form generation and backend prize management.
businessImpact: Enabled marketing teams to create and manage campaigns independently, reducing dev cycles and empowering non-technical staff.
highlights: Built backend logic to dynamically generate Supabase tables based on custom form fields.
Delivered admin dashboard for prize management and participant tracking.
Designed reusable architecture for future promotions.

title: Talos IoT
description: IoT-driven HVAC diagnostics platform with dashboards, user interfaces, and real-time hardware feedback.
businessImpact: Enabled predictive maintenance through real-time monitoring, reducing downtime for commercial HVAC systems.
highlights: Built dashboard elements in Grafana for visualizing system health.
Developed user-facing websites to interact with IoT data.
Contributed to firmware for Guardian boards.

title: Soar 365 Website
description: Contract role to remediate ADA compliance issues and improve site usability for a nonprofit serving individuals with disabilities.
businessImpact: Delivered an accessible, maintainable site and trained the marketing team to manage content post-handoff.
highlights: Audited and fixed ADA compliance issues.
Migrated site to Wix for easier long-term management.
Provided training for non-technical staff to maintain the site.

title: PresenceLearning Website
description: Modernized and maintained a WordPress site providing remote therapy solutions for students.
businessImpact: Helped improve digital access for students in need of educational support services.
highlights: Upgraded frontend with responsive, modern layouts.
Consolidated and simplified email template workflows.
Ensured accessibility and performance improvements.

title: Sauer Brand Websites
description: Core brand websites for Sauer Brands portfolio: sauers.com, dukesmayo.com, mateos.com.
businessImpact: Delivered stable, scalable Shopify-based brand hubs with accessible design and marketing alignment.
highlights: Collaborated with marketing to design and implement brand-consistent layouts.
Used Shopify Liquid to customize themes and functionality.
Ensured ADA compliance and cross-device responsiveness.

title: Sales Reporting Tool
description: Custom Python-based reporting platform for Sauer Brands’ Shopify data.
businessImpact: Replaced inadequate built-in Shopify reports, automating nightly exports and formatting for Oracle ingestion.
highlights: Pulled daily sales data from multiple Shopify stores via API.
Transformed and formatted data for Oracle compatibility.
Automated CSV delivery via email, integrated with Oracle workflow.

title: Blue Door Art Gallery
description: An artist portfolio website built to showcase my wife’s paintingsand gallery exhibits in a clean, modern interface.
businessImpact: Provided a professional online presence for her gallery work and exhibitions, making her art accessible to a broader audience.
highlights: Built a responsive, mobile-friendly gallery layout with filtering and image zoom.
Optimized images for fast loading without sacrificing quality.
Designed a simple admin workflow so updates could be made easily.

title: Megan’s List
description: A custom book and wine tracking app built with Supabase to help my wife log and review her reading and wine experiences.
businessImpact: Showcases my ability to build lightweight, data-driven applications tailored to personal needs, leveraging modern back-end services.
highlights: Implemented Supabase authentication and user profiles.
Designed schema to handle books, wines, ratings, and notes.
Built responsive UI with React for easy logging and browsing.

title: Pick a Restaurant
description: An APK mobile app I built for my wife and me to make choosing restaurants easier. The app uses a quick questionnaire to narrow down options from a custom database of our favorite spots.
businessImpact: Created a personalized restaurant picker that tracks our dining habits, stores reviews, happy hour info, and remembers what we liked about each restaurant. Demonstrates practical use of full-stack mobile development to solve everyday problems.
highlights: Developed a questionnaire flow to recommend restaurants based on stored preferences.
Built a Supabase backend to log visits, reviews, happy hour details, and restaurant styles.
Implemented logic to track how often we visit each restaurant and surface fresh suggestions.
Packaged and deployed as an APK with Expo for Android use.

title: Cat Tracker
description: An APK mobile app built for my wife to track and map outdoor and stray cats around Richmond. Users can drop pins on a map, upload cat photos, and log their encounters.
businessImpact: Demonstrates the ability to integrate geolocation and Google Maps APIs with a custom Supabase backend. A practical, real-world use of mobile development to build a fun and community-focused tool.
highlights: Integrated Google Maps API for live location tracking and pin drops.
Enabled users to upload cat images tied to GPS coordinates.
Designed Supabase backend to store locations, photos, and encounter history.
Implemented Edge Functions for secure handling of uploads and location data.

title: Wyrmspire D&D Website
description: A custom-built site to manage and showcase my original Dungeons & Dragons campaign, Wyrmspire. Designed as both a lore archive and an interactive toolset for my players.
businessImpact: Highlights creative problem-solving, custom UI building, and integration of narrative with functional systems. A demonstration of how I use code to enhance storytelling and collaboration.
highlights: Developed interactive features for session recaps, character tracking, and lore management.
Built modular UI components for maps, encounters, and inventory tracking.
Designed for live play, ensuring responsive layouts and real-time usability at the game table.

title: Longrock Slot Machine
description: A fun, in-world slot machine mini-game created for the Wyrmspire campaign. Built to immerse players with a fully interactive, animated experience.
businessImpact: Demonstrates my ability to blend design, animation, and logic to create engaging front-end experiences that delight users.
highlights: Built spinning reel animations with JavaScript and React state logic.
Randomized outcomes while controlling probability for balanced gameplay.
Integrated custom styling and theming to fit the Wyrmspire universe.

title: Wyrmspire Arm Wrestling Game
description: A physics-inspired arm wrestling mini-game designed as an in-session challenge for Wyrmspire players.
businessImpact: Showcases creative game mechanics, user input handling, and interactive UI development in React.
highlights: Created a competitive click/tap mechanic simulating arm wrestling strength.
Balanced gameplay logic for fair outcomes while allowing dramatic swings.
Delivered an immersive side activity that enhanced the D&D session experience.

title: Change in Uzbekistan
description: Custom site for an international client built while at Kurb Media.
businessImpact: Delivered a fully branded, client-approved site tailored to stakeholder requirements.
highlights: Worked directly with client to capture requirements and translate them into code.
Developed responsive and accessible design.
Provided ongoing support during launch.
